data.title: Poor service not so good food
data.text: Just average of that. Had to ask for check 3 times finally just went to front counter. Sat at bar and had to wait for somebody to finally ask what I needed. Chicken in burrito was dry, beef in enchilada was seasoned horribly. They do a good job if you want just rice and beans.

data.title: Great food
data.text: Excellent food and large portion sizes. We got the double order of chicken fajitas and it would have been plenty for at least 3 people. The small cheese dip was also great. It was a bit pricey for a Mexican restaurant but otherwise good.

data.title: Fast Service
data.text: Great Margarita's and fabulous food we eat here almost every Sunday. Love the cheese dip. Great Service and prices are great.

data.title: Good Times
data.text: Another large group excursion and the staff did a great job with our order.  Even fixed a order bc we had a dairy allergy and were worried that it might have gotten cheese on it.  Took the dish back and remade just to be safe.  The food was great and we will return again!

data.title: YUMMY FOOD
data.text: This was our first time at a senor tequila and it probably won't be our last! The food was yummy and the staff were super friendly. The food was excellent and very inexpensive.

data.title: Inviting Atmosphere, Great Garlic Shrimp
data.text: We have always enjoyed this locale, as it is inviting and relaxing. Recently enjoyed the Garlic Shrimp and it was delicious! Although this is yet another Mexican Food restaurant in Conway, if you try the less typical dishes,, you will be pleasantly surprised.

data.title: Could have been better
data.text:
First time visitor to Senor Tequila, visiting friends in Conway. We had a party of 12 so we knew we would be there a while but when they bring the third round of drinks and waters you know you have waited a long time for the food.

I ordered the chicken fajita taco salad which looked good when he sat it down in front of me. As soon as I turned over the first fork full I knew we had a problem. I don't know where all of the liquid came from but it should have been called Taco Soup instead of salad. So disappointing. The flavors were pretty good but I finally poked holes in the taco shell bowl to let out some of the liquid because it was impossible to eat with a fork!! I finally gave up.

Chips and salsa were okay. We didn't have dessert. Server was kind and courteous, it just took a while. I would try it again and be sure not to order the same thing.

data.title: Lunch with friend
data.text: Had my birthday lunch with my best friend here last week.  Wasn't very busy so we stayed awhile and they were very nice.  I wish the food was different than every other Mexican restaurant in Conway BUT you at least don't smell like Mexican food after you've eaten there.  The restaurant decor is nicer too.  Chips and salsa were good,  and wait staff is very fast.  Average prices,  all-in-all the 4 times I've eaten there it's been good.

data.title: Overcharging customers & rude management
data.text:
The food is good & location is good. When we first walked in the doors in front were locked so people were looking at us from inside then came out to open the door for us. They did not know why doors were locked. They let us in and this preppy looking guy advised his server to give us this very TINY booth. Next to main counter and next to main door. 

My partners booth was wobbly and not stable. The booths next to main entrance/next to their counter are very small & can't even get in to seat. I asked server to give us different booth but that preppy manager advised her to give us booth behind our old one. I was frustrated very much and couldn't even get inside to seat, so I pulled out the table and rearranged my self to get in. (they didn't like that?)  the new booth was in same location next to main door and their main entrance/counter. Every time someone went out we were blasted with very cold air. I nod my head and get our and put on my sweater. 

No big deal. We went on eating our food which was good. When bill came we were wondering why the bill was so big? We added up our costs and came to find out that they were overcharging us. We signed the credit card receipt left tip & notified that manager. He is like you got jalapeño so that's why. My wife is like ok but it's still higher. 

So she went down to other menu item & he pulled out his menu and checked priced. He is like Yeah its a mistake and we charged you higher. So we were like ok... He starred at us like that was ok? We left restaurant telling him to fix this issue. We are not requesting refund but fix it. 

As far as booth. There were bigger booths in back which were empty and lot quieter area. The ones we were given are for kids hard to get in and not enough place to put food. It's also next to main entrance with cold air blasting your face. 

The shift manager working on 1/1/16 9.30pm was total denial and was just plain jerk.

data.title: Great Staff fresh food
data.text: The only bad part of my experience is the young lady ( American lady long brown hair) when walking in by my self standing waiting to be seated, the lady merely ignored me and waited until a group of 6 people walked in and she greeted them as if she knew them and sat them I ended up getting a manager to sit me and then I was taken care of immediately . The food was great and I mean great and my Diva drink was really good it had cubes of apples in it . you should try it. the food is kinda priced a little high but well worth it . JJ the manager is excellent . My server Silva was wonderful always made sure I had fresh hot chips and salsa and removed any plates needed. MY favorite new Mexican rest. PARKING TIPS go thru the alley next to the rest. and park in the back . Best way to park since it is down town. but don't give up on the parking because the food and service is well worth it . Also JASON the bartender is amazing at making drinks to perfection!!!!!!

data.title: Food is always good, but I appreciate the seating options.
data.text: I've eaten at Senor Tequila numerous times in other cities, and have always enjoyed the food.  However, the Conway restaurant is located in a wonderful space.  Love the privacy of the booths.  Staff is friendly and efficient.
